description:
A compact little light with more than bright enough to get the job done. Whether you’re getting back to camp later than expected or working on the car, the Capon 120D gives you 3 different types of lighting to chose from. Rechargeable by USB, gone are the days of “good enough” batteries. A rotatable clip lets you clip this light on the brim of your hat or a pack strap for headlamp-like lighting, without a headlamp strap.

  • 3 types of lighting, flood light – spreads light up to 180°, focused spotlight, and red spotlight
  • Motion sensor lets you wave your hand along the side of the light to turn it on, a nice feature when you have gloves on or dirty hands
  • Smooth dimming, just press and hold the button to dial in your perfect brightness; range: white light 25-340 lumens, red light 4-60 lumens
  • Red lighting mode saves your night vison and is less likely to disturb tentmates on those early starts
  • SOS mode is there if things take a turn for the worse
  • LED battery indicator lets you know how your battery is doing in use and while charging
  • IP54 waterproofing isn’t bothered by heavy rain
  • Rotatable and tilting clip gives you mounting options
  • Easy USB-C charging, 0-100% in 2h
  • Dimensions: 5.4 x 5.7 x 3.4cm
  • In the box: Capon 120D, carabiner, storage pouch, USB-C charging cable
name: Claymore Capon 120D Cap Light
